title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Student-Led Metacognitive Enhancement in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online discussion participation and advanced language learning expertise
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze discussion topics by utilizing metacognitive knowledge (awareness of cognitive processes) in online debates.
Learners can evaluate and adjust argument structures by applying self-monitoring strategies during discussions.

Learners can demonstrate metacognitive regulation skills during collaborative meaning-making processes with peers over one week, submit a collaboration journal (three entries) reflecting at least three instances of feedback acceptance and two strategy revisions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
